text: Zombie High (also known as The School That Ate My Brain) is a 1987 horror comedy movie directed by Ron Link and stars Virginia Madsen, Paul Feig, Sherilyn Fenn, Clare Carey and Scott Coffey. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1987 comedy movies Category:1987 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies set in boarding schools Category:Movies about classical music and musicians Category:Movies about mind control
title: Zombie High
